body: Robinson Tombari Sibe shows how the Nigerian President has changed the face of Nigerian politics: "President Jonathan has enlarged the political workspace in Nigeria by not only playing by the rules but also encouraging perceived opponents in their quest to unseat him."
original_body: Robinson Tombari Sibe shows how the Nigerian President has changed the face of Nigerian politics: "President Jonathan has enlarged the political workspace in Nigeria by not only playing by the rules but also encouraging perceived opponents in their quest to unseat him."
title: Nigeria: The new face of politics

sentence: Robinson Tombari Sibe shows how the Nigerian President has changed the face of Nigerian politics: "President Jonathan has enlarged the political workspace in Nigeria by not only playing by the rules but also encouraging perceived opponents in their quest to unseat him."
